summary: The module supplies utility classes and helper functions for interacting with large language model services. It encapsulates logic to request chat‑based and plain text completions, manage embedding creation, handle Azure and OpenAI authentication, and collect runtime usage statistics.
business_intent: To provide a reusable component that enables applications to generate AI‑driven responses and suggestions, integrate with Azure/OpenAI APIs, and monitor consumption metrics for cost and performance management.
